description: To find scenes where the kids of Springfield are the main focus
narrative: Scenes should mainly follow one of the Springfield kids, which not only include the Simpsons family but also returning characters like:
Ralph Wiggum, Milhouse Van Houten, Nelson Muntz, Martin Prince, Sherri and Terri, Jimbo Jones, Dolph Starbeam, and Kearney Zzyzwicz.
